item.title: Paper: Enhanced Bedside Mortality Prediction Combining Point of Care Lactate and the Quick Sequential Organ Failure Assessment (QSOFA) Score in Patients Hospitalised With Suspected Infection in Southeast Asia: A Cohort Study
item.description: PubMed: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/35961351/ Comment: “A combined qSOFA-lactate model for sepsis-related mortality prediction: a small step towards an elusive answer?” https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/35961331/
